name: 3d-virtual-assistant-ai
description: The **3D Virtual Assistant AI for Astronauts** is an advanced AI-powered system designed to assist astronauts in space missions by providing real-time voice interaction, facial animations, and intelligent responses. This system integrates **AI Large Language Models (LLMs)**, **Python FastAPI**, **React**, **Three.js**, and **Text-to-Speech (TTS)** to create an immersive and interactive experience.
